actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing that a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the Ninety-eight Congress be printed as a House document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing as a House document of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 98th Congress. Provides for additional printing of such document for the use of the House and Members of Congress.

titles.title: A resolution providing that a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the Ninety-eight Congress be printed as a House document.
